name: Assembly Basics Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of the basics of Assembly language.

questions.questionText: Which of the following is NOT an Assembly instruction?
What is the purpose of the Assembly language?

name: Assembly Registers Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of the registers in Assembly language.

questions.questionText: Which register is used to hold the memory address of an operand?
What is the purpose of the stack pointer register?
options: To hold the memory address of the next instruction to be executed
To hold the memory address of the top of the stack
To hold the memory address of the data segment

name: Assembly Instructions Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of the instructions in Assembly language.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the ADD instruction?
Which instruction is used to compare two values in Assembly?
Which instruction is used to jump to a specific location in the program?
